name: Dime Till Die v000
description:
The krillpin have invaded earth, defeat them!
Play alone or with a friend.

Controls:
KEYBOARD

WASD- MOVE
LEFT MOUSE CLICK - SHOOT
I-INVENTORY
F-INTERACT
R-RELOAD
1-4 - TOOL KEYS
LEFT SHIFT - RUN
SPACE - JUMP

GAMEPAD
LEFT STICK - MOVE
RIGHT STICK - LOOK
A-INTERACT
X-RELOAD
R_TRIGGER-SHOOT
D_PAD - TOOL CYCLE
LEFT_BUMPER - RUN
B - INVENTORY
Y - JUMP

#If you get stuck press the ` key to respawn

Current Version 001

Release Notes

version  001
-Added missing icon images for items

version  000
-missing sound effects files
